logoutSuccessDescription: You have been successfully logged out.
signInToDashboard: Ready to dive into your veterinary analyses?
signupSuccessDescription: Welcome to Zooesis! Please log in.
authenticationErrorDescription: Please log in to access this page.
verifyEmailDescription: Almost there! We sent a confirmation link to your inbox.
checkInboxMessage: Please check your email for a message from us and click the verification link to activate your account.
spamFolderMessage: If you don't see the email in a few minutes, please check your spam or junk folder.
